ygData.subject: Will my account still be good?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok another question? Since I have not played in some time, will my account still be good? By that I mean will my char still be available to me when I do get
ygData.messageBody:
Ok another question? Since I have not played in
some time, will my account still be good? By that I
mean will my char still be available to me when I do
get around to playing again? I know that I will
always have an account so long as I have a valid c/c and
my cd codes, but will my characters still be there
if I have not played them in some time? I don't
think I would be too upset if I have to make new
characters 'cause it's always fun starting from scratch.
*grimaces* But if I have to, well then I guess I have to.
....hhhmmm reminds me of another question? What's a good
server to be on? I was on E'ci with some friends (the
ones who twisted my arm to get me to play EQ in the
first place!) but they have stopped playing so I am
thinking of changing servers. Thanks for letting me ramble
a bit. The Raven
